article_title: Israel to appeal Netanyahu ICC arrest warrant.
sentence: Just  six  days  ago  -  before  news  of  a  ceasefire  broke  -  judges  at  the  International  Criminal  Court  (ICC)  issued  arrest  warrants  for  Israel's  Prime  Minister  Benjamin  Netanyahu  and  his  former  Defence  Minister  Yoav  Gallant,  as  well  as  a  Hamas  commander,  Mohammed  Deif,  who  Israel  says  was  killed  in  July.
